com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.optimizedupdate

Class FactorUpdatePlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.optimizedupdate.FactorUpdatePlan

  • @Internal
public final class FactorUpdatePlan
extends java.lang.Object
    A plan for updating a factor. Each factor table has a unique plan, but factors that share a factor table share a plan. A plan consists of a list of steps to perform to an actual factor, which provides the actual edge messages and other per-factor properties.
    Since:
    0.06

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static FactorUpdatePlan create(IFactorTable factorTable,
                      ISFactorGraphToOptimizedUpdateAdapter tableWrapperAdapter,
                      double sparseThreshold)
        Constructs an update plan for a given factor table. The same plan may be applied to any factor that uses the same factor table.
        Since:
        0.06

      • apply

        public void apply(ISTableFactorSupportingOptimizedUpdate tableFactor)
        Applies an update plan to a factor. The factor must use the same factor table as used to construct the plan.
        Since:
        0.06

      • estimateOptimizedUpdateCosts

        public static Costs estimateOptimizedUpdateCosts(IFactorTable factorTable,
                                 ISFactorGraphToOptimizedUpdateAdapter tableWrapperHelper,
                                 double sparseThrehsold)
        Estimates the costs of applying the optimized factor update algorithm to a factor.

        The estimation assumes that the content of sparse tables is distributed randomly throughout the table, rather than examining the actual locations of the data. Using this assumption, the density of each auxiliary table is computed without actually populating their data.

        Parameters:
        factorTable - A factor table that describes the factor.
        Returns:
        The estimated costs.
        Since:
        0.07
